group_1.textCenter: If it's a demon girl you need, there's one@at my place.

group_1.textRight: (No way. Could she be talking about Yachiyo@Nanami?)

group_1.textLeft: It's been a while, "Phantom Thief Karin".

group_1.textRight: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]You don't have to bring that up! That's all@in the past!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* Still, I'm glad you seem to be@doing a lot better for yourself recently.

group_1.textRight: (She's way less intimidating than the last@time I saw her...)
(Plus, I don't even think she had anyone she@called friends back then, either...)

group_1.textLeft: So, I understand that we're here to talk @about a Halloween play.
But Felicia...

group_1.textRight: Yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Who exactly are you saying is a demon?
I heard you said she lives with you.

group_1.textRight: You're always makin' me do homework, and@forcin' me to go to school!
You even limit how much time I can play @video games!
Only demons do that, right?!

group_1.textLeft: No, Felicia.
Yachiyo only does those things because she@cares about you!

group_1.textRight: If she really cared, she'd let me play video@games!

group_1.textLeft: Don't they say no child, er, no sister knows@how dear she is to her big sis!
Anyway we can leave the lecture for later.
You've been talking about Halloween forever,@so...
Why this play all of a sudden?

group_1.textRight: I have a good reason!
That's the story... That's why I decided@to do it!
I need to be even more Halloween-y than @I have been until now!
And I really want the play my grandma@asked me to help with to be a big success!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, your grandma asked you...
I see.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You'll do it?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I was raised by my grandmother in this@very house.
So I can understand why you'd want@to help her.
I'll be your demon girl.

group_1.textRight: Th-thank you so much!

group_1.textLeft: If you need me, I wouldn't mind playing@a small part too.
Yeah, me too! ME TOO! I'm gunnin' for a@supporting actress award!

group_1.textRight: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you so much, everyone!

group_1.textLeft: You're very welcome.
You better prepare yourself, Felicia.
This demon girl is going to have to reprimand@her cow minion every now and again...
It's a very important part of the role.

group_1.textRight: Uh...

group_1.textLeft: Grandma!

group_1.textRight: Oh? What is it?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'm getting really excited about the@Halloween play!
I've found a lot of great actors. I think@it's gonna be really good!

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* I'm glad you're having fun, Karin.

group_1.textLeft: Once things got rolling, it really did start@being fun!
So things are proceeding well?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! I only have to find one more actor for@the part of the wolf.
Still, what a relief!

group_1.textLeft: So you've designed the costumes?

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: ...Have you only been thinking about actors?

group_1.textRight: What am I going to do...

group_1.textLeft: I, Alina, can try my hand at it if you like.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, really?! You'd really offer to do that?

group_1.textLeft: They won't be the best quality. This kind of@work isn't my area of expertise.

group_1.textRight: That's fine! It'd be a huge help!

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll come up with something. This may@prove to be fun.
